moves.1. e4:
Smothered Mate - another useful tactic

e4 a standard classical opening
moves.1... e5: e5 - the best move available if you are ging for the classical opening
moves.2. Nf3: Nf3 - the best move you could do with your g1 Knight
moves.3... Nd4: Nd4? leaves the e5 pawn open
moves.5. Nxf7: again, what else would you do?
moves.5... Qxg2 6. Rf1: obviously, since White has trapped Black's rook, you'd get your rook to safety first
moves.7. Be2: unless you want your queen to be taken, that's what you'd do
